name: Save The Bar
description:
Hi! This is my First Game. Pls check out the game and feel free to give your feedback about the game. 

INSTRUCTIONS

This is a simple game.  Here the player can use the "SPACEBAR" to fire bullets at the objects coming to destroy the bar. At first the player and the enemies move slowly but as time progress, speed increases. Enemies that arrive towards the end of the game needs 2 bullets to get destroyed. One more thing to add, there is a boss awaiting for you who wants to steal the crown of victory from you. Use the "MOUSE" to navigate through the screens.

HOPE you will ENJOY the GAME. THANKS FOR PLAYING IN ADVANCE :)
